t: Lao Gan Ma - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - Despite the brand's success upon launch, it struggled with counterfeits with similar packaging in China. They proliferated due to the Chinese government turning down Lao Gan Ma's application to trademark the product. After the trademark request was denied, counterfeit Lao Gan Ma came to prominence.
